entry.tran: 杂活工;家里的动手能手
entry.def: A handyman is a man who earns money by doing small jobs for people such as making and repairing things in their houses. You can also describe a man who is good at making or repairing things in his home as a handyman .

means.word_mean: 1. a man skilled in various odd jobs and other small tasks
